definition: surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
he or him/(used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)/(used before sb's name for emphasis)/(used as a meaningless mock object)/other/another

sentences.english: Leo Fender’s guitars weren’t just versatile, they were also durable.
sentences.chinese: 利奧芬達的吉他不僅萬能，而且耐久。

sentences.english: Basso continuo will be played here by the guitar.
sentences.chinese: 在本場演出裏，則將由吉他來演奏通奏低音。

sentences.english: This is an automatic guitar tuner for your phone.
sentences.chinese: 這是你的電話一個自動的吉他調音師。

sentences.english: Then the Mute Singer began to play his guitar, moving his lips with the music.
sentences.chinese: 沉默的歌手開始談起吉他，嘴脣隨着音樂張合。

sentences.english: After breakfast he plays his guitar, then he goes to work.
sentences.chinese: 當他喫完早餐後會彈吉他，然後去工作。

sentences.english: She played the main part of the songs on the lowest guitar strings.
sentences.chinese: 她彈吉他弦上最低的歌曲的主要部分。

sentences.english: Jessica's musical talents range from singing opera to playing the electric guitar.
sentences.chinese: 傑西卡很有音樂天分，從唱歌劇到彈電吉他她都會。

sentences.english: In the market for a home-made guitar pick or a mini canvas brooch?
sentences.chinese: 你正在搜尋自制吉他撥片或迷你帆布胸針？

sentences.english: I and a yellow army of one guitar , sings well, the sound has been broken.
sentences.chinese: 我和黃大軍一人一把吉他，唱得不好，一直破音。

sentences.english: It was the Mute Singer still holding his guitar.
sentences.chinese: 原來是沉默的歌手，他依然拿着吉他。

sentences.english: And then I pick up my guitar.
Jacky played the guitar and sang together with children.
sentences.chinese: 梁俊淇同學一邊彈奏着吉他，一邊和孩子們唱歌。

sentences.english: He plays the guitar as well as you.
sentences.chinese: 他的吉他彈得和你一樣好。

sentences.english: The guitar player gave a fantastic solo during the riffage.
sentences.chinese: 那個吉他手在即興演奏中的獨奏部分表現十分出色。

sentences.english: He met me before so he let me teach him guitar.
sentences.chinese: 因爲他以前見過我，於是就讓我教他吉他。

definition: to sing and play (plucked string instrument)
instrument of the violin family (violin, viola, cello or double bass)/CL:把[ba3]
